game.name: 13 柱庭 Cabal 13
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Cabal-13, a fast-paced multiplayer roguelike auto-chess game! Choose your hero, build a unique team, and compete in ever-changing battles. Strategy and luck unite in this hero-focused adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Cabal-13, a fast-paced multiplayer roguelike auto-chess game! Choose your hero, build a unique team, and compete in ever-changing battles. Strategy and luck unite in this hero-focused adventure.
